dcterms:creator: Ankush Khandelwal
Sahil Swami
Syed S Akhtar
Manish Shrivastava
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 3543 annotated tweets where 1755 are labeled humorous and 1698 are labeled non-humorous, used for evaluating the effectiveness of bilingual word embeddings and deep learning models for humor detection in code-mixed Hindi-English tweets.
dcterms:title: Benchmark dataset for humor detection
